track.name: d|p 1.1
comments: Catchy as fuck with loads of hooks [2]
I was expecting a drop...
when's the drop?
i'll never forget the day i heard this, in its entirety on the radio, i didnt think that would ever happen
gets me emotional
Perfect for reading.
I've got hold of orchestrated version. I'm just speechless.
One of the most wonderful music trips i've ever been in.
Slowly we rust each day with each breath we take,
Drone bliss.

Fade far away, dissolve, and quite forget / What thou among the leaves hast never known /
The weariness, the fever, and the fret / Here, where men sit and hear each other groan; / Where palsy shakes a few, sad, last gray hairs, / Where youth grows pale, and spectre-thin, and dies; / Where but to think is to be full of sorrow and leaden-eyed despairs / Where Beauty cannot keep her lustrous eyes / Or new Love pine at them beyond to-morrow.
Catchy as fuck with loads of hooks
This is the beautiful sound of the death of permanence. Thank you.
I can't study without having this on. I honestly can't. I've tried.
Extraordinary.
Thought my headphones were messed up haha, pretty cool how it sounds like that. Only 15 minutes in but it's already been an amazing experience
What a tiring journey.
great, but...i agree with arithmetic, i'd prefer a bit more balance between channels.
speechless
This one gets me there.
